t: r/amazonemployees on Reddit: What does amazon actually drug test for
What kind of drug test does Amazon warehouse use? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): I understand everyone frustration. I can’t speak for no one else. Unfortunately, I just pass the swab test for Amazon, with no problem. Not to mention I’m a heavy smoker daily. I stop smoking 4 days before my testing, also raise my mouth out daily along with brushing twice ...
